attributes.action: Get doctors to see patients not phone appointments
attributes.additional_details:
Because since covid G P doctors 
do not see patients they do over the phone  appointments my grandson ended up seriously I’ll from this and I know lots of people feel the same  the hospital can not treat patients  who are very sick as they are seeing patients GP should be seeing
attributes.background: I would like the government to insist doctors see patients not phone appointment especially with young, vulnerable and elderly patients, as people are getting really Poorly as they can’t see a doctor

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

There are no Government restrictions that prevent GPs from holding face-to-face appointments. Decisions relating to GP appointments, including decisions on whether face-to-face appointments are appropriate, are operational matters for the NHS and individual GPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Review accessibility to primary care and face to face appointments with GPs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615422
